blog_content:
In this write-up we will be solving Natas Level 1 in order to get the password for Level 2.

OverTheWire has provided us with a prompt for Level 1.



Here we have been given the username natas1. We will be using the password we found by solving the previous challenge (Read OverTheWire: Natas: Solving Natas 0 -> Natas 1)gtVrDuiDfck831PqWsLEZy5gyDz1clto.

Navigating to the website (http://natas1.natas.labs.overthewire.org/), we get a prompt to input username and password, we will use the above mentioned credentials to log in.



We are again greeted by a generic landing page, It says 'You can find the password for the next level on this page, but rightclicking has been blocked!'.



There seems to be no password on the page. Let's try inspecting the source code for this page. Press right click and then click on Inspect.

To no avail, right click has certainly been blocked and we are greeted by an alert.



Well lucky me, there are more the one way to view the source code of the page. Press 'Ctrl+U' to view the source page.



Voila!! We have the password for the next level.

Password for Level 2 is: ZluruAthQk7Q2MqmDeTiUij2ZvWy2mBi
